propFirmText:
Hi, we pass challenges on all firms.
On average it takes us 10-15 days per phase.
We do not guarantee that we pass in that timeframe, but if we fail to pass, we pass any future challenges for free.

We Charge $425 for accounts 50k or lower & $750 for accounts 100k and above.
The payment can be sent via Apple Pay, Cash app, Zelle, Bitcoin or Card Payment

You purchase the prop account & send the passing fee, then send the MT log in and server details.

I ask you to never log in unless it’s via investor password. Which some firms don’t provide. If that is the case, you monitor via Website Dashboard :)

To go back click /start
freeAccessText:
Deposit $500+ and actively trade on the account inorder to get FREE LIFETIME ACCESS.

4XC are also providing a 50% first deposit bonus, to get you up and running!!

If you need assistance or have any questions : @Andrei_4XC_BDMn
